title: Launcher Chat Connection Issue
body:
Log into the launcher, everything works but the chat (everything on the right side including summoner icon options) fail to connect and never do.  I can start game a game and play, but the chat in launcher, during champ select and inviting/being seen by other players does not work.

I have downloaded the hextech repair tool and ran it (elevated) to repatch, then full clean reinstall to no avail.  The issue still persists and from what I can tell I'm the only one I've talked to that is having this problem.

I submitted a bug stating the issue and have not heard back about it.  At a loss on what I can do to fix this issue and any thoughts would be helpful on what I haven't tried already.

Thanks,


Edit: Pic
Chat Connection Issue https://imgur.com/gallery/HTzhF

replies.body: Thanks for the report here!  We've seen some reports on this over the last day from a small amount of players, and checking to see if there might be anything going on.  Some have suggested that forwarding port 5223 or using a VPN might work, but I recommend starting with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve whatever is blocking you from reaching pvp.net.  Give it a go and let me know if it helps!
I tried everything there was to try on that list and nothing alleviated the issue :/

Thanks for letting us know.  Just in case, try syncing your OS clock as well.  Should that fail, reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We want to continue investigating this and see why it's impacting some players.  See you there!
I can confirm that using a VPN to get around whatever is going on, works. I'm connected to the NA server from....Canada. You must understand this is just a temporary fix.
Port forwarding requires you to login to your router at home. I set up forwards for everything on that connections list and it didn't fix my authentication problem. So...good luck lol
As an update: this newest patch installed and the issue has been fixed for me :D

Same issue for me, Hextech Repair Tool was useless and even a 
CLEAN reinstall didn't work

The HRT is really good at fixing bad game files, but not really connection issues.  The best bet for that would be our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide!

I followed most of that guide and still have the same issue :( 

Some things like port forwarding don't make sense since it used to work without any special port configs, so I skipped past those parts.
